title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the DocumentationAnalyticsEngine, including the types of analytics to be provided, data sources, user personas, desired features, and non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, scalability, security).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integration points.

title: Design Data Pipeline
description: Design the data pipeline for ingesting and processing documentation usage data from various sources.

title: Design Analytics Engine
description: Design the analytics engine that will process the ingested data and generate insights and reports.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for presenting the analytics and insights to users.

title: Implement Data Pipeline
description: Implement the data pipeline for ingesting and processing documentation usage data.

title: Implement Analytics Engine
description: Implement the analytics engine for processing the ingested data and generating insights and reports.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Implement the user interface for presenting the analytics and insights to users.

title: Integrate Components
description: Integrate the data pipeline, analytics engine, and user interface components into a cohesive system.

title: Test and Validate
description: Perform comprehensive testing and validation of the DocumentationAnalyticsEngine, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the DocumentationAnalyticsEngine to production and set up monitoring and logging systems.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the DocumentationAnalyticsEngine, including user guides, technical documentation, and deployment instructions.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement appropriate security measures to protect the system and user data, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.
